descriptions: The seedlings of the crop are more vulnerable to downy mildew
The infection can be passed through air can develop fully with humidity
damages: There are yellow or white streaks coming from the base of the leaf up to the blades.
Lack of greeness of the leaves or chlorosis
At seedling stage, the crop can be distorted or stunted.

process: Apply right amount of nitrogen because high level of nitrogen increases the chance of having downy mildew
Use varieties resistant to downy mildew
